name: Kang-Fu
description: You will play as a kangaroo named Klont (Klont), thanks to which the rescue of little kangaroos is carried out by placing them in your bag, and at the same time connecting to the table includes various aggressive creatures and objects (yes, yes). Klont is dressed in blue pants with red suspenders and a striped T-shirt. He has some - not very large - health reserve, as well as a small number of “lives”; If the last one is lost, the game ends.
